name: SKBatcher
summary: Batch loading content for UITableView or other progressively-loading controllers
description:
SKBatcher intelligently loads, preloads, and caches content for cases where
a long list of items will be gradually viewed (e.g. scrolled) by a user. It
is intended for cases where you have a group of objects on a server and need
to obtain ancillary data for those objects to display in a UITableView,
UICollectionView, etc. in an efficient manner.

For example, if a chat app needs to show a list of all of a user's chats,
it can reduce server load and increase user responsiveness by using one or
more SKBatchers to manage loading the chat content for only the chats that
are being shown, will likely be shown soon, or have already been shown.
